com.pranavpandey.android.dynamic.support.setting

Interface DynamicPreference.OnPromptListener

  • Enclosing class:
    DynamicPreference

    public static interface DynamicPreference.OnPromptListener
    Listener to get various callbacks related to the popup and dialog.

    It will be useful if this preference is displaying a popup or dialog and we have to restrict it from doing that.

    Most possible situation is if we want to display the color picker dialog only if user has purchased this feature.

    See Also:
    DynamicColorPreference, DynamicSpinnerPreference

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean onDialog()
      Returns whether to allow this preference to show the corresponding dialog.
      boolean onPopup()
      Returns whether to allow this preference to show the corresponding popup.
      void onPopupItemClick(AdapterView<?> parent, View view, int position, long id)
      This method will be called when a popup item is clicked.

    • Method Detail

      • onPopup

        boolean onPopup()
        Returns whether to allow this preference to show the corresponding popup.
        Returns:
        true to allow this preference to show the corresponding popup.

      • onPopupItemClick

        void onPopupItemClick(AdapterView<?> parent,
                      View view,
                      int position,
                      long id)
        This method will be called when a popup item is clicked.
        Parameters:
        parent - The adapter view displaying the items.
        view - The item view which has been clicked.
        position - The position of view inside the parent.
        id - The id of the view.

      • onDialog

        boolean onDialog()
        Returns whether to allow this preference to show the corresponding dialog.
        Returns:
        true to allow this preference to show the corresponding dialog.
